name: GALACTIC DISHARMONY
description:
• CONTROL your fleets and planets in the campaign mode  and take over the ever changing solar system!
  • BATTLE your foes in first person action on randomly generated maps with destructible environments , taking your fleets into action.
  • UNLOCK new technologies to build improved units and vehicles for your fleets. Recruit powerful sector leaders to improve your empire.

----------------------

Also includes a custom mode for trying out all the units on any planet.

IN DEVELOPMENT:  This game is not yet complete! Many features are not finalised and many units and weapons are not yet in the game.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/ShadedSoftware
